#include <iostream>

using namespace std;

int main()
{
    int t;
    cin >> t;
    while (t--) {
        string s;
        cin >> s;
        for (int i = 0; i < s.size(); i++) {
            if (s[i] == 54 || s[i] == 55|| s[i] == 56 || s[i] == 57) {
                int d = 10*(s[i]-48) + (s[i+1]-48);
                char c = d;
                cout << c;
                i++;
            }
            else if (s[i] == 51) {
                cout << " ";
                i++;
            }
            else if (s[i] == 49) {
                int d = 100*(s[i]-48) + 10*(s[i+1]-48) + (s[i+2]-48);
                char c = d;
                cout << c;
                i = i + 2;
            }
        }
        cout << endl;
    }
    return 0;
}
